pages.text: Wa 'Idh Qalat 'Ummatun Minhum Lima Ta`izuna Qawmaan Allahu Muhlikuhum 'Aw Mu`adhibuhum `Adhabaan Shadidaan Qalu Ma`dhiratan 'Ila Rabbikum Wa La`allahum Yattaquna
Falamma Nasu Ma Dhukkiru Bihi 'Anjayna Al-Ladhina Yanhawna `Ani As-Su'i Wa 'Akhadhna Al-Ladhina Zalamu Bi`adhabin Ba'isin Bima Kanu Yafsuquna
Falamma `Ataw `An Ma Nuhu `Anhu Qulna Lahum Kunu Qiradatan Khasi'ina
Wa 'Idh Ta'adhana Rabbuka Layab`athanna `Alayhim 'Ila Yawmi Al-Qiyamati Man Yasumuhum Su'a Al-`Adhabi 'Inna Rabbaka Lasari`u Al-`Iqabi Wa 'Innahu Laghafurun Rahimun
Wa Qatta`nahum Fi Al-'Ari 'Umamaan Minhumu As-Salihuna Wa Minhum Duna Dhalika Wa Balawnahum Bil-Hasanati Wa As-Sayyi'ati La`allahum Yarji`una

Fakhalafa Min Ba`dihim Khalfun Warithu Al-Kitaba Ya'khudhuna `Araa Hadha Al-'Adna Wa Yaquluna Sayughfaru Lana Wa 'In Ya'tihim `Araun Mithluhu Ya'khudhuhu 'Alam Yu'ukhadh `Alayhim Mithaqu Al-Kitabi 'An La Yaqulu `Ala Allahi 'Illa Al-Haqqa Wa Darasu Ma Fihi Wa Ad-Daru Al-'Akhiratu Khayrun Lilladhina Yattaquna 'Afala Ta`qiluna
Wa Al-Ladhina Yumassikuna Bil-Kitabi Wa 'Aqamu As-Salaata 'Inna La Nui`u 'Ajra Al-Muslihina
